name: Packy - Factory Sim
description:
Submission to the 2020 Quarantine Game Jam #NdabJam

...

The robots at the factory have magically stopped working. It is now up to you to pack the items into their respective boxes and not keep the customers waiting.

...

Controls:

- Left Mouse : Pickup / Throw item

- Right Mouse : Drop item

...

Enjoy (my first ever) game
